text:
Daughter of AÃ­da Merlano freaks Instagram with daring costume with transparencies
AÃ­da Victoria Merlano Manzaneda - who rose to fame after the escape of her mother, the former congresswoman, from a dental center - published a video that surprised her followers.

05 Nov 2019

AÃ­da Victoria Merlano Manzaneda has surprised Colombians for its beauty.
The young woman, who, with only 5 posts on her Instagram account, accumulates more than 61,000 followers this time amazed her followers with a short video showing the costume she wore on this Halloween.
Merlano appears as a black angel, who wears a tiny outfit with black lace and wears dark wings. Merlano mounted the clip on his Instagram account and the compliments rained:
"Let a witch come out like that to me", "Beautiful", "Oh what a woman", "Divine how always you my love" were some of the comments.
Merlano Manzaneda celebrated Halloween the first week of November and wrote in the publication:
â€œThe only thing I have and will always have in my hands, is my attitude towards adversity. ğŸ‘»ğŸƒ Happy Halloween! ğŸ¬ â€
